headers.subject: [tosdr:2821] Yelp [bad]:

html:
Yelp TOS (pt.14.B and C "Termination") state that in case the user account is closed, Yelp can still continue to use users content - and the user retains full liability w/o any access to the very content.

++

  1. We may close your account, suspend your ability to use certain portions of the Site, and/or ban you altogether from the Site for any or no reason, and without notice or liability of any kind. Any such action could prevent you from accessing your account, the Site, Your Content, Site Content, or any other related information.

  2. In the event of any termination of these Terms, whether by you or us, Sections 1, 5, 6, 10 - 14 will continue in full force and effect, including our right to use Your Content as detailed in Section 5.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Yelp [bad]:
text:
Yelp TOS <http://www.yelp.com/static?p=tos&country=US> (pt.14.B and C 
"Termination") state that in case the user account is closed, Yelp can 
still continue to use users content - and the user retains full liability 
w/o any access to the very content.

++

   1. 
   
   We may close your account, suspend your ability to use certain portions 
   of the Site, and/or ban you altogether from the Site for any or no reason, 
   and without notice or liability of any kind. Any such action could prevent 
   you from accessing your account, the Site, Your Content, Site Content, or 
   any other related information.
   2. 
   
   In the event of any termination of these Terms, whether by you or us, 
   Sections 1, 5, 6, 10 - 14 will continue in full force and effect, including 
   our right to use Your Content as detailed in Section 5.
   

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
